name: Ruby NashÂ¹

topics.response_text: Hello there. What brings you to Primm?
Guess you'll be needing to find some, huh? Come back when you do.
One's enough to make a helping. Hand it over!

topics.topic_text: I've got a few radscorpion glands.
topics.response_text: Hand 'em over and I'll get to baking!

topics.topic_text: I have a bunch of radscorpion glands.
topics.response_text: Is that right? Then hand 'em over and I'll get to baking a whole batch of casseroles!
My mother taught me never to say something 'less it was nice. So I don't have nothing to say about Primm, for the time being at least.

topics.topic: RNashCasseroleHowManyI have some radscorpion glands. Can you make me some casserole?
topics.topic_text: I'd like some of that radscorpion venom casserole.
topics.response_text: Does sound good, don't it? How many radscorpion glands you got?
My specialty is a radscorpion venom casserole. It's a more appetizing than it sounds!
I'm Ruby Nash. Pleased to make your acquaintance.

topics.topic_text: McCarran's mess hall needs more variety.  Could we work out a deal?
topics.response_text: Well, business is pretty light and I'd welcome the income, but I'll need a lot of caps to buy the necessary supplies.
Great. I'll just pick up future payments from McCarran directly when I drop off my snacks.

topics.topic_text: <Give 100 caps> 200 seems a bit steep.  How about 100?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You drive a hard bargain, but 100 caps will do until we can get a regular deal worked out with McCarran.

topics.topic_text: McCarran has more vegetables and water than they know what to do with...
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Fresh food and water is worth it's weight in gold... You've got yourself a deal.

topics.topic_text: Maybe we could work something out later.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself.  I'm always open to more business.

topics.topic: VMS02AnyNPCAboutNCRAny idea what the NCR's up to in Primm?
topics.topic_text: Do you know if the NCR has any plans to attack the prison north of here?
topics.response_text: I wouldn't know anything about that, dear. You might ask Johnson.

description:
Ruby Nash is a 68 year-old African American Female.

Ruby Nash is an elderly African American woman who runs the Mojave Express outpost in Primm with her husband Johnson Nash. She has a warm demeanor and is often found smoking cigarettes near the slot machines at the Vikki and Vance Casino. Ruby is a skilled cook, known for her hearty meals that provide comfort to the weary travelers passing through Primm.

Ruby Nash's Personality: Ruby is a pragmatic and resilient woman who has adapted to the harsh realities of the Mojave Wasteland. She maintains a calm and collected demeanor, even in stressful situations, and is known for her wisdom and patience. While she may appear reserved at first, she is kind-hearted and willing to help those who show respect.

Ruby Nash's Backstory: Ruby Nash was born and raised in New California before the Great War that devastated the world. She and her husband Johnson lived in various settlements across the wasteland before settling in Primm in 2272. Together, they established the Mojave Express outpost, becoming integral members of the small community. When the Powder Ganger attack disrupted Primm in 2281, Ruby and the other inhabitants sought refuge in the Vikki and Vance Casino, where she continued to provide support and comfort to her fellow townspeople.
